name: Sea Salt Bath Soak // Juniper Muscle Soother
description:
Stress less. Bath salt treatment created with a unique blend of aroma-intensive essential lavender + eucalyptus oils, juniper berries and soothing sea salts to relax and soothe tired and strained muscles.

◦ Vegan + never tested on animals
◦ Handcrafted with natural essential oils, organic herbs and mineral-rich sea salts.
◦ 8oz container holds enough for 3-4 baths
◦ Includes muslin bag

name: Sea Salt Bath Soak // Ylang Ylang
description:
Ignite your passionate side. Bath salt treatment created with a unique blend of aroma-intensive essential ylang ylang + geranium oils, organically grown rose petals, and soothing sea salts to comfort and inspire heightened sensuality.

◦ Vegan + never tested on animals
◦ Handcrafted with natural essential oils, organic herbs and mineral-rich sea salts.
◦ 8oz container holds enough for 3-4 baths
◦ Includes muslin bag
